website_summaries.verdict: Cotton lace makes a comfortable yet sexy and stylish statement.
pros: Eye-catching sunflower design is pretty and garners many compliments, while the longer length offers plenty of cover up
A ribbon at the chest means it can be tied, too, for more versatility
cons: Only available as one size (medium) and in black or white

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cover up for my trip to Hawaii, it's probably the best purchase I've made on amazon. I've gotten so many compliments! My number one concerne was if it was long enough to cover my whole butt .. I can happily say that I am 5'8, 180lbs and it more than covers my butt!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this coverup. Got so many compliments on it while on vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Katelin

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: I bought that as a coverup, however the material and style is cute with a dress or pants too. I love the pattern and bright white color. It is loose fitting, but I loved it so much that I ordered the only size available (M). I am 5’4” 114 and it fits fine. The style is meant to be loose, so it looks good. I did cut the strings off bc I felt they were unnecessary and a little awkward. You would never know. I found this same kimono in a dark blush color (minus the weird tie/strings) at Marshall’s in a small for $16.99. The small fits very similar to the Medium, no major difference.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty cover up
customer_reviews.text: I loved how this looked. It fit me well and I'm not small. I'm a size 12 and there was plenty of room. There's a ribbon tie at the chest to keep it secure when walking if need. I love how it's airy so I'm not sweating when covered.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: I'm really happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I had this item in my wishlist since LAST year and finally decided to purchase it. I'm really happy with it...got many compliments. It fits as expected. The tie string is higher up and not in the middle of the length. It is soft and yes, it is truly WHITE. :) . I'm 5'6' and weigh about 163 pounds. Great cover up.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette Masullo

customer_reviews.title: Versatile for beach or normal wear
customer_reviews.text: I know this kimono is technically marketed as a bathing suit cover, but I used it as a kimono for our baby announcement photos and love how it looked! It comes with little ties in the front for your waist that I simply cut off and looks just like any other cover I’d wear with a dress or pants. No issues so far!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous-looking coverup
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a cruise and also because I needed another suit coverup. Ordered a Med because I wanted it a bit loose. I really loved it and got so many compliments on it every day I wore it. Unfortunately, something got on it the last day of the cruise & I couldn’t get the stain completely out. It was the very end of the summer so I didn’t need it again for a while but now summer is coming so I am buying another!! So affordable, made well, looks great, came in the mail quickly, so why not? I liked it so much, I also want the black version as well, so I’ll have two.
customer_reviews.author: Jess B

customer_reviews.title: Great look
customer_reviews.text: The cardigan fits great and is just the right length.
customer_reviews.author: Essy

customer_reviews.title: Great versatile coverup/kimono!
customer_reviews.text: SO HAPPY with this purchase! I’m a mom of 2 and ordered this to wear as a beach coverup that could also double as an outfit with a pair of shorts. It did not disappoint! It worked perfectly! It is very lightweight but I felt covered enough even though it’s mostly see-through mesh. It washed beautifully and the little tie in the front helped keep it closed. It looks and fits exactly as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley W.

customer_reviews.title: I believe it can be sewn up pretty easily but still a hassle
customer_reviews.text: Very cute! I saw this at a boutique store near my summer home so i purchased here for much cheaper. Only complaint is that there is a small hole in back. I believe it can be sewn up pretty easily but still a hassle. I will keep because it is cute and to much of a hassle to return but still kinda bummed I have to sew up something I just purchased :/
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!!!
customer_reviews.text: I used this at the hot springs spa, it was perfect! I felt the drawstring ties in the center were too high, so I removed and sewed them back on in the center. Not a big deal, personal preference. Light coverage, cute design, great price. I think it might be best to hand wash, quality of material seems delicate and may not withstand washing machine cycle.
customer_reviews.author: April10

customer_reviews.title: I wear it like a jacket!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this cover-up as a jacket! . I saw a girl wearing the white cover-up at a pool party over her swim suit and I ordered it right then on my phone and it arrived the next afternoon. I wear it as a jacket to work with a sleeveless top under and a pair of jeans, SUPER cute. I have had so many compliments on this cover-up/jacket. I think I will buy another one to have when this one wears out....I have worn it often! As for the size, it only comes in medium and I usually wear Large or XL (size 12) and it fit me perfect. It should say, "fits most"
customer_reviews.author: HollyH

customer_reviews.title: Great quality at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Love this cover up- for the cost, you can’t get any better! Lightweight, quality feel. I also like the tie in front. Very boho- I got this to wear with bathing suits for my anniversary getaway with my husband. For reference- I am 5’2/5’3 and weigh about 135.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy Obermeyer

customer_reviews.title: I really like this cover-up
customer_reviews.text: I really like this cover-up! My only complaint is where they put the strings to tie it - they kind of fall mid-boob (if you're large-chested), which is not a great place. They could have been moved down to the waistline to be a bit more comfortable and flattering.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Beale

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: I wore this pregnant so I was hoping I was unable to close it which stunk so I wore it open all the time which is why I was shocked the tie fell off. It’s nice for the price but I wouldn’t expect it to last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon KT

customer_reviews.title: Very cute.
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. I loved it. Tho if you want to look different from others this is not for you. Went to beach in FL, at least 10 different people through the weekend had the same one. Great conversation piece but not an stand out piece. Tho my friend did a tie dye on it in pinks and blues, super cute and stand out piece for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for any occasion
customer_reviews.text: I love the fit and well-constructed cover-up! I plan to use it over a dress to make it a bit more festive! Thank you so very much! The lace cover-up arrived on the date that was listed and it was well-packaged. So excited to wear this soon!!
customer_reviews.author: Rosalie A.Moyer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful cover up chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful cover up, all cotton, fits perfectly as a size medium. Only issue is it arrived with a strong chemical/ petroleum odor. Still slightly present even after hand washing
customer_reviews.author: A. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This cover up is beautiful! It looks exactly how it does online. I love the detailing and the lace. I wore it on a cruise and it was perfect. It can also be worn as a little cover up outside of swimwear with jeans or something. My only discrepancy is that, I could've sworn I ordered a small, bc I'm petite, but I received a medium. So mine is a little more roomy than I would like, but it's still a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique

customer_reviews.title: Very cute cover-up!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the cover-up for a vacation. Looks great in photos and paired well with my mustard bathing suit. It has built-in ties that go across the chest just under the collarbone. I thought they were in a weird place and I'll probably cut them off. Otherwise great cover-up
customer_reviews.author: Ashton B

customer_reviews.title: Looks too much like lingerie
customer_reviews.text: I don't think it's very flattering on me and it looks like a piece of lingerie which makes me feel a little uncomfortable now to go out in public. There's no stretch to to it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Nicolich

customer_reviews.title: Cute but big
customer_reviews.text: I bought a medium and it’s huge! I usually wear a medium but I’d say this fits like an extra large. It being too big is the only down fall because it is super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful cover up. I may buy another!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and well made. I wish it were a little longer and the tie closure should be lower, but this is so very lovely. I got it to use as a cover up, but may buy another to wear with outfits.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Smith

customer_reviews.title: So cute but small
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'7" and 190lbs it comes 3" under my butt. The sleeves come down to my elbow but it doesn't close in front. However, I really like it. Its super cute and protects all of my tattoos from the sun! Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute bathing suit cover up I love it it’s just what I wanted
customer_reviews.author: Brittni

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute Cover-up!
customer_reviews.text: I was actually amazed with how cute this cover-up is. The fabric is a nice weight, the pattern is placed well and the product is well made! I'm very impressed and will make a point to look for Jeasona products in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne B

customer_reviews.title: Looks cute but is actually tacky
customer_reviews.text: The material is unraveling and I just removed it from the garment bag. it's garbage quality. it's huge too yet the tie-strings are just on either side of the opening so you cant even wrap it. it feels scratchy and looks terrible.
customer_reviews.author: BA1234

customer_reviews.title: Great quality - looks much more expensive!
customer_reviews.text: This is gorgeous and the quality is much better than I expected! The detail is beautiful and very well done. This will look gorgeous over any bathing suit. I probably won't tie the front but the ties are not very noticeable so will look more than fine open. So happy I found this!
customer_reviews.author: Katelin

customer_reviews.title: Cute swim coverup!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality swim coverup. Has a nice little tie on each side so you can secure the top closed if you want. Material is good quality. Doesn’t feel cheap and pattern is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: DianaH

customer_reviews.title: Looks expensive
customer_reviews.text: Love! Awesome value for the money. Looks expensive and high end without the cost - who wants to spend a bunch of $$$ on something you're going to sweat in, get sand or chlorine on, as well as sunscreen?!
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: I love this cover up
customer_reviews.text: I love this cover up! I was hesitant since, when I purchased, there were no reviews on the product. I am more than happy with it and so glad I bought it. It is a little big which made it very comfortable to wear. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I've worn and washed this three times now and its great! Love it, simple, easy to throw over an outfit. Using it for my bridal shower and later a swimsuit coverup!
customer_reviews.author: katie

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: I’m really happy with this. Can wear with a swimsuit or with an outfit.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: cute, but broken
customer_reviews.text: Right after opening, I untied the strings in the middle to try it on and one side immediately fell off. Not the best quality, but cute.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: so many compliments
customer_reviews.text: I wore this to a pool party and received so many compliments! It's beautiful in person, seems well made and I would recommend to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: jvonrohr214

customer_reviews.title: Yes!!
customer_reviews.text: Yes!!! Finally a coverup that is good quality and FIts! It’s very pretty and elegant looking. A bit heavier material than I thought but I like it. For sure recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Super cute beach cover up and more!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this kimono! I was hesitant based on the price point, but I was pleasantly surprised once I wore it to the beach and as a light cardigan over a dress to dinner. I love how it multi-tasks. It looks much more expensive than it is. Win win in my book!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful !
customer_reviews.text: Super cute ! Great material fits great. Wash before wearing it has strong plastic sent.. Other than that it’s just a perfect ! You will love it !
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last
customer_reviews.text: It’s short and runs small and the tie fell off after first wash. Disappointed and done.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: Do not hesitate to buy this! I'm wearing it right now. It is so versatile and beautiful! You can wear it as a swimsuit cover up, but it's great as a kimono over any dress, romper or shorts. I'm 5'3, 180, bigger arms and its so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Traci

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bathing suit cover up.
customer_reviews.text: I love this cover up. The length, the fit, the style exceeded my expectations, and the price was very reasonable. I have gotten lots of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy S.

customer_reviews.title: Not as cute in person
customer_reviews.text: Looks much cuter online. Ran a but small where it doesn't really close and the length is right below butt cheek. Would have been nice if it re longer like in picture
customer_reviews.author: ChristinaK

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised with how cute this was for the price.. I am planning to wear it as a beach cover up and sometimes as a kimono over a tank top. It has a string on each side where you can tie it shut if you want but don't have to.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Not the right product
customer_reviews.text: This came as some see through slinky thing that looked like a sexy night gown cover up. It was nothing like the photo. It certainly wasn't crochet Beach Dress. The photo looks darling. They totally got it wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Susan J Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight pretty cover up
customer_reviews.text: I love this coverup, I wore it in Vegas over bathing suits as well as with denim shorts with a tucked in tank top underneath. I did cut off the strings in the center because I felt it made it look cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Landau

customer_reviews.title: Well made for price. Good value!
customer_reviews.text: Decently well made for price and looks very nice on. I haven’t washed it yet, but if holds up after it’s washed it will get an extra star in my book!!
customer_reviews.author: A. MARQUEZ

customer_reviews.title: G
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful!! White is great with a tan, and the pattern is so pretty! Exactly what I was looking for! Ties in the front too so easy to put on and take off. I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: NK

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely great purchase the fabric and detail of this coverup is so beautiful and feels such high quality I would definitely recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Meshieu Rangel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for pool party
customer_reviews.text: Nice fit and good for the price! One of the straps broke during first use but planing on sewing it back on.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Item is just as described
customer_reviews.text: The kimono is absolutely stunning and great fabric not cheap looking at all. However it was a bit small for me 😩 I would have liked it to fit a lil more loose.. but would definitely recommend it if you’re smaller than a xxl
customer_reviews.author: Roxie

customer_reviews.title: Happy buyer!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this cover up! It is very pretty and form fitting. For reference I am 5'3" 150lbs and it's loose, it flattering. Exactly how it's supposed to be. I've had lots of compliments too!
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Great coverup!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute cover up! I thought it would be longer but it fits great and I normally wear a size L/XL
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes Ritchie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Can wear as a bathing suit cover or even a summer time kimono. Very cute and light.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri C

customer_reviews.title: Attractive Coverup!
customer_reviews.text: I am 5’7” 190lbs. Size 12-14. Fits is perfect. Length is perfect. Style is lovely. Material seems sturdy enough.
customer_reviews.author: TMK

customer_reviews.title: So beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful!!! I got the medium. I am 5’6” and 153 pounds
customer_reviews.author: Erica McCorkle

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Really cute cover up, soft material runs a tiny bit big but i didnt mind
customer_reviews.author: jodi brown

customer_reviews.title: So cute and versatile!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! I got it to wear as a beach coverup so I can be in my bathing suit all day but with a little more coverage when wanted, and I ended up wearing it out for drinks over a cute outfit when I first got it! Can throw it over pretty much any outfit- super excited to have this as a staple piece in my closet!
customer_reviews.author: AS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to vacation wardrobe
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous! This is a great buy for the price... it’s really beautiful over a great bikini. Perfect addition to your vacation wardrobe.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and flattering
customer_reviews.text: This coverup was perfect! Exactly what I was hoping for. For reference, I’m 5’6” and 173 pounds. It doesn’t close up in the front as much as I was hoping it would, but it’s cute over a bikini and jean shorts. Perfect for a lake day!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: From the beach to a party....
customer_reviews.text: Very cute tunic. This was bought as a bathing suit cover up. However, it could easily be used as an open robe on top of an outfit as well. Fabric has good quality and retains its look and feel after washing.
customer_reviews.author: JRC

customer_reviews.title: Much Better Than Expected
customer_reviews.text: This is stunning and well made. I am a tad over 6' tall (size medium/155 lb.), and it is plenty long. I will wear it with skirts, slacks, palazzo pants......very versatile.
customer_reviews.author: kwinsd

customer_reviews.title: Such a great piece! ☺️
customer_reviews.text: I wore this over my bathing suit but it ended up becoming more of something I would wear over a tank top. It’s perfect and flattering for any outfit. I received so many compliments just walking around town. Absolutely love it and it’s so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this coverup! I wear it as a kimono cardigan as well and get so many compliments on it! It’s comfy, light, and Can dress up an outfit!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Van Ry

customer_reviews.title: Great value, beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful and perfect for the beach or boating! Well made! I bought black and white.
customer_reviews.author: Jeniferjune

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Got so many compliments. I’m 5’1 the length was about to my knees. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Mike J

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: Love love. I wear it over dresses more than I do a coverup. I looks real cute with pants and a top also. Get lots of compliments
customer_reviews.author: April Cook

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This lace coverup is so beautiful. I received many compliments at the pool :)
customer_reviews.author: Adrianne

customer_reviews.title: Get it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely adorable and a bathing suit cover up or with a cute outfit! Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: String ties felt unnecessary, and was too hot to wear around pool
customer_reviews.text: Found it uncomfortable, not breathable, and ultimately more of a hassle to wear than a realistic cover up. String ties felt unnecessary, and was too hot to wear around pool. Pretty though!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Cover Up
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in both White and Black. Beautiful detail. Would advise washing in a lingerie bag and hang drying to prevent snags.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle M.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful cover up
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful cover up. I love that it's long enough to cover my rear, and I'm 5'7". Only 4 stars because material is very delicate and I'm afraid it may rip easily if not careful. I would definitely hand wash and hang to dry. Otherwise I love it. Very beautiful and feminine.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty cover up
customer_reviews.text: Very nice cover up that could be worn at the beach or out and about with shorts and a tank top, really cute and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Pansy Skognes

customer_reviews.title: Great Cover-Up
customer_reviews.text: i love this coverup. i got one for my sisters birthday and i had to send her the link because all of her friends wanted one too! super cute and good price. only weird thing about it is where the strings that are optional to tie it together in the middle are high up
customer_reviews.author: Denise Glimcher

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY BEAUTIFUL COVER
customer_reviews.text: Love! Love! Love! this cover. I received a ton of compliments poolside on how beautiful it is. I used it to cover my bathing suit, and tied it in the front to use as a shirt with white shorts.
customer_reviews.author: amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: This cover up is gorgeous and very flattering. Great length also. I got many compliments wearing it! I also love how it has a little tie in the front of you want to close it more.
customer_reviews.author: J. Crimmings

customer_reviews.title: Completely different
customer_reviews.text: Not what I ordered. (See photo). Received a crocheted pullover, not a lace kimono. No tag to indicate a size but it’s small! Returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Dina Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and absolutely adorable. Only thing is the strings in front - cut those off, it looks so much classier without them.
customer_reviews.author: GrandmaC

customer_reviews.title: Adores
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this cover up! It compliments maxi dresses, shirt & shorts kinda day and swimsuits. It looks so much prettier in person!
customer_reviews.author: Alon_Ann

customer_reviews.title: It's beautiful, but it's not white
customer_reviews.text: It's beautiful, but it's not white. It's more of an ivory color. If white is what you need, then this isn't what you want to order, but it does look beautiful! I wish they had it in black as well.
customer_reviews.author: Soo-Zee-Cue

customer_reviews.title: Buy this now! Changes the look of your outfit in just minutes!!
customer_reviews.text: I wore this as a bathing suit cover up, and got so many compliments on it! Fits great and true to size!!! Everyone asks where I bought it, and are very surprised when I tell them amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: KJFKL

customer_reviews.title: Must Have!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing I have both the white & black bought the white from another seller anyway they are both gorgeous cant wait to wear them September on my trip to South Beach
customer_reviews.author: DEE

customer_reviews.title: My favorite!
customer_reviews.text: This cover up is very pretty and my favorite one out of 5 that I purchased -disappointed that the string to tie in the middle broke off.
customer_reviews.author: Baby0415

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful cover up
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! I love it, it’s a 100% cotton! Very nice pattern! Really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Sayli Perez

customer_reviews.title: It looks lovely and I think it will be very nice to wear around the pool and beach
customer_reviews.text: I have not used my Beach cover up yet, but I am looking forward to wearing it in Mexico soon. It looks lovely and I think it will be very nice to wear around the pool and beach.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to any outfit!
customer_reviews.text: This is super cute over a tank or a swimsuit! For reference I’m 5’4, 160 lbs, and I ordered a medium. Fits great!
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: Cute Cover Up!
customer_reviews.text: This cover up was so cute on! It felt like it was made well and looked fabulous in pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Kimono. It’s great quality and I got a lot of compliments on it in Mexico!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Fuhr

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this as a bathing suit cover up. The quality is great, looks just like the picture. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing, get comfortable as a cover up
customer_reviews.text: I get so many complements on this cover up and it’s lasted me a long time. Good quality and washes well!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan C

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: love this cover up! it was perfect for the beach!
customer_reviews.author: Kris B

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the coverup. I would definitely order another one! Looks like a high dollar item and you can even wear with a tank top and capris. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Roark

customer_reviews.title: Love this cover-up
customer_reviews.text: Only issue is the tie is a little flimsy across the middle but it is super cute!
customer_reviews.author: TheresaS01

customer_reviews.title: AHHHMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing not to love about this coverup. It truly made every suit I was wearing look that much cuter and I felt so cute in this while in Mexico! I am 5'3'' , 124lbs.. so as you can see it did not fit snug on me which I LOVED!
customer_reviews.author: MommaKayy

customer_reviews.title: Nice coverup
customer_reviews.text: Runs pretty true to size but is NOT white. It's ivory
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! Really love it and use it with my dresses as well!
customer_reviews.author: Zandra

customer_reviews.title: Cute (with an initial smell lol)
customer_reviews.text: This coverup is very cute. Be aware there is an awful smell and I had to leave it outside for 2-3 days first.
customer_reviews.author: Officer Sheldon fan🚔

customer_reviews.title: Fit is great
customer_reviews.text: Color and pattern are beautiful. Bottoms are just a tad snug, I ordered a large but didnt want them to be saggy. Wearing this for an upcoming cruise and I'm excited.
customer_reviews.author: amy clark

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love with this. Got a lot of compliments for it
customer_reviews.author: schade trotman

customer_reviews.title: GET IT!
customer_reviews.text: This cover up is so adorable, I LOVE it!! I'm 5'2 and 120 lbs, it is a larger fit but looks super cute!!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I get alot of compliments on this coverup. Very simple & sweet.
customer_reviews.author: Missina Cutting

product_meta.title: Jeasona Women’s Bathing Suit Kimono Beach Cover Up Lace Crochet Pool Swimwear
feature_bullets: Size: US Size M. Bust: 40in, Length: 35in
High Quality Fabric: Made of soft Lace and cotton, breathable and a little bit see through, delicate floral pattern and comfortable to wear.
